description: This policy setting controls, when and if diagnostic logs can be collected using specific button combination on HoloLens.
name: FallbackDiagnostics

options.description: Not allowed. Diagnostic logs cannot be collected by pressing the button combination.
options.name: Not allowed. Diagnostic logs cannot be collected by pressing the button combination.
options.displayName: Not allowed. Diagnostic logs cannot be collected by pressing the button combination.

options.description: Allowed for device owners only. Diagnostics logs can be collected by pressing the button combination only if signed-in user is considered as device owner.
options.name: Allowed for device owners only. Diagnostics logs can be collected by pressing the button combination only if signed-in user is considered as device owner.
options.displayName: Allowed for device owners only. Diagnostics logs can be collected by pressing the button combination only if signed-in user is considered as device owner.

options.description: Allowed for all users. Diagnostic logs can be collected by pressing the button combination.
options.name: Allowed for all users. Diagnostic logs can be collected by pressing the button combination.
options.displayName: Allowed for all users. Diagnostic logs can be collected by pressing the button combination.
